summary: This bill, the "Improving Access to Addiction Medicine Providers Act," aims to amend the Public Health Service Act to enhance the Minority Fellowship Program. It focuses on awarding fellowships for training addiction medicine professionals. The bill amends the existing law to include "diagnosis" in the subsection related to the fellowship program and adds "addiction medicine" to the list of fields under subsection (b). The bill's intent is to improve access to addiction medicine by supporting the training of more professionals in this critical field.
